trans-unit.source: If needed, manual installation is possible:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要,可以进行手动安装。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to fork or modify the code, visit the GitHub project page, where the latest versions are always kept. Check the ‘master’ branch for the latest release, and the ‘develop’ for the current, and stable, development version.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望分叉或修改代码，请访问GitHub项目页面，该页面始终保留最新版本。检查“ master”分支以获取最新版本，并检查“ develop”以获取当前的稳定开发版本。

trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Issues are managed at the GitHub project issues tracker, where any Github user may report bugs or ask for new features.
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub项目问题跟踪器中管理问题，任何Github用户都可以在其中报告错误或要求新功能。

trans-unit.target: 只需多次调用'value'方法即可访问结果，每次调用该方法都会生成一个新的随机值：

trans-unit.target: 文档的源文件是一个小的Sphinx项目，位于'docs文件夹中。

trans-unit.target: 该项目所包含的测试可以用以下方式运行。

trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,可以建造这些。

trans-unit.target: 这些可以安装与。

trans-unit.source: This notation is widely used on tabletop games, such as wargames or RPGs, and was created on the late 70s for Dungeons & Dragons, as a way to allow generating random values in specific distributions.
trans-unit.target: 此符号广泛用于桌面游戏，例如战争游戏或RPG，并于70年代末为《龙与地下城》创建，以作为一种允许在特定分布中生成随机值的方法。

trans-unit.source: This project aims to give support to the dice notation, allowing parsing and operating with it on any Python application.
trans-unit.target: 这个项目旨在为骰子符号提供支持,允许在任何Python应用中进行解析和操作。

trans-unit.source: This will delegate the execution to tox.
trans-unit.target: 这将委托 tox 来执行。

trans-unit.source: To use it just import the parser:
trans-unit.target: 要使用它只要导入解析器即可。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: With the pass of years it has evolved, and while it never underwent a formal standarization process a core set of rules is kept among all the variations, mostly representing dice in a format such as ‘1d6’, and the use of algebra operations like addition and subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 随着时间的流逝，它不断发展，尽管从未经历过正式的标准化过程，但在所有变体中都保留了一组核心规则，主要是用“ 1d6”等格式表示骰子，并使用诸如加法的代数运算和减法。

trans-unit.source: antlr4 -Dlanguage=Python2 DiceNotation.g4 DiceNotationLexer.g4
trans-unit.target: antlr4 -Dlanguage=Python2 DiceNotation.g4 DiceNotationLexer.g4

trans-unit.source: or forking the repository and extending the project
trans-unit.target: 或分叉版本库并扩展项目

trans-unit.source: pip install --upgrade-r requirements.txt
trans-unit.target: pip install --upgrade-r requirements.txt。

trans-unit.source: pip install dice-notation
trans-unit.target: pip install dice notation

trans-unit.source: python setup.py build_docs
trans-unit.target: python setup.py build_docs

trans-unit.source: python setup.py install
trans-unit.target: python setup.py 安装

trans-unit.source: python setup.py test
trans-unit.target: python setup.py 测试

trans-unit.source: python setup.py test -p "py38"
trans-unit.target: python setup.py test -p "py38"
